recipe.title: How to Make Takoyaki
recipe.intro: Takoyaki are small round balls from Osaka. They have octopus inside and are crispy outside.
recipe.ingredients: flour, egg, water, dashi powder, octopus, green onion, pickled ginger, takoyaki sauce, mayonnaise, bonito flakes, vegetable oil
steps: **Mix** flour, egg, water, and dashi powder in a big bowl to make the batter.
**Cut** the octopus, green onion, and pickled ginger into small pieces.
**Heat** oil in the takoyaki pan and pour the batter into each hole.
**Drop** a piece of octopus and some green onion into each hole.
**Turn** each ball with a pick when the bottom is cooked.
**Cook** until all the balls are round and golden brown. Put sauce, mayonnaise, and bonito flakes on top. **Enjoy!**

review.content: I went to Sunset Bay Kitchen last Thursday. It was a fun little restaurant in Woolloongabba. The inside was warm and colorful. There were yellow and pink lights on the walls. I ordered takoyaki and a cold drink. The takoyaki were hot and crispy outside. The octopus inside was soft. The staff were very friendly. I sat on a comfortable sofa and enjoyed my meal. It was a wonderful evening.

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Olivia, have you ever eaten takoyaki?

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: No, I have not. What is it?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: It is a small round ball with octopus inside. It is from Osaka.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Octopus? That sounds fun! How do you cook it?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: You pour batter into this special pan. See the small holes?

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Yes! They are so cute. What do I put in?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Put one piece of octopus and some green onion in each hole.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: OK, I did it. What is next?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Now we wait. When the bottom is cooked, turn it with this pick.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Oh, it is hard to turn! But I will try.

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: You did it! Look, it is a perfect ball!

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Wow, I am so proud! Can I eat it now?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Yes! But be careful. It is very hot inside.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Mmm! It is crispy and delicious. I love takoyaki!
